ac.ucy.cs.spdx.license

Class License

  • java.lang.Object
    • ac.ucy.cs.spdx.license.License

  • public class License
extends java.lang.Object
    This is License object class. It consists of several constructors and methods for editing and accessing data. The object consists of the license name, identifier and text.
    Author:
    dpasch01

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      License(java.lang.String url, License.Category... category)
      License constructor that creates a new License object based on the license url and also the category parameters, which is optional.
      License(java.lang.String license, java.lang.String identifier, java.io.File licenseText, License.Category... category)
      License constructor that creates a new License based on the license name, identifier and File containing the License text that are passed as parameter.
